posts.caption: apple.com
posts.description: Apple has lost a visionary and creative genius, and the world has lost an amazing human being. Those of us who have been fortunate enough to know and work with Steve have lost a dear friend and an inspiring mentor. Steve leaves behind a company that only he could have built, and his spirit will fore...

posts.message: By the way, i'm not an Apple fanboy, But at least respect it, specially Steve which i thought has a legendary success story, Not only that .. I'm loyal to Microsoft to my bones (Bill Gates also have no academic degree on computer science, but learned BASIC by himself ...:)
